text: Just thinking out loud. A good test case would be the RSS 2.0 spec, which doesn't look too great after years of no-updates (more than 20 years) and browser slippage? It started life as a Manila site, transitioned to WordPress, and now I believe it's a static site. At one time it looked good in WordPress. It could totally use the kind of treatment Doc's blog got, but obviously it's serving a different purpose.
